ruling: - If [[Different Dimension Capsule]] is destroyed with [[Heavy Storm]], etc., the card removed from play remains removed from play for the rest of the Duel.

- If [[Imperial Order]] is activated, count the Standby Phases normally for [[Different Dimension Capsule]]. If [[Imperial Order]] is active during the second Standby Phase, you cannot add the removed card to your hand and [[Different Dimension Capsule]] stays on the field meaninglessly, and the removed card remains removed from play for the rest of the Duel.

- If [[Imperial Order]] is chained to the activation of [[Different Dimension Capsule]], then the effect of selecting a card from your Deck disappears and [[Different Dimension Capsule]] is destroyed.
